title: niubiduang
author: niubiduang
content: Do you want to start your own cryptocurrency based on the Ethereum source code? If so, this may be the service you are looking for! This service is targeted towards the following users:Individuals or groups who want to start their own Ethash altcoin.Owners of online communities who want to start their own Ethash cryptocurrency for their users.DApp developers who want their own private Ethereum blockchain for testing purposes.The following can be provided as part of the service:Bootnode compiled for Linux.Customized web wallet.Block explorer.Setup bootnodes, block explorer, and web wallet node, including VPS configuration (Nginx, systemd services, SSL, firewalls, etc).Instructions on how to launch the coin.All source code uploaded to Github.The node can be customized to implement any of the following features:Premine in genesis block to one or multiple accounts.Miner block reward adjusted to any value.Block rewards to one or multiple developer accounts.Reducing or staggered block / developer rewards with chain progression.Delayed block rewards (fair start).Removal of Ethereum difficulty bomb.Changes to difficulty adjustment algorithm.PirlGuard 51% attack resistance.This service is completely confidential, including all enquiries and communication.So what are you waiting for? Start your coin today before the next crypto bull run!The fee depends on the level of service and number of features you want implemented. Please send details of your project, including:Name of the coin and brief description of the project.Which services you want from the above list.The level of node customization you want, from the above list.Please send enquiries by PM, or to niubiduang@gmail.com. If sending a PM, please enable 'Allow newbies to send you PMs' under 'Personal Message Options' in your account profile.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: You can aswell provide some details as touching the jobs you have done prior to this time. You seem to forget that you have Â a newbie tag and that keeps you at a very low level in terms of forum reputation, the only way to get gigs might be to have some notable memebers here recommend you or have your portfolio of jobs arrayed for forum users to know that you have done jobs and can be trust with more based on comeptency and profile.
